comments.text: User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13 Build Identifier: whatever version is on landfill today See attached. Basically just tried to create a new test cases with a summary default tester status priority category See attached screenshot. Reproducible: Always Steps to Reproduce: create a new test case from the test plan 390 in the landfill See details. See attached screenshot. Actual Results: An Error Has Occurred The user error string invalid_status was not found. Please send email to ghendricks.com describing the steps taken to obtain this message. The user error string invalid_status was not found. Please send email... Expected Results: test case is created
